title: Pixel 4a records video without sound
content:
Just opened up a new pixel 4a and installed all updates. I'm getting some odd behaviour with the mics. When I record a video I get no sound or very scratchy/poppy audio. Also have irregular behaviour with the recorder and video calls. Regular phone calls are fine. After many restarts, and a factory reset, the recorder looks like it's working better but not perfect as well as WhatsApp video calls. The video recording started working for a short while but has reverted to no sound while the video is fine.

Any idea s?
